Articles.Content:
Hello forum! I just recently discovered this part of the forum, and I decided to show my funny and cool ksp videos here! Please move this if it should be somewhere else!

I like to make fun to watch ksp videos while trying new ways of exploiting bugs or just the way stuff blows up! So.... Here are my funniest videos I made!

KSP Random Clips #2: Shooting down a Plane! This video was to try to see if I could shoot down a plane in KSP, because a friend said that it would be awesome if you could. It took a lot of training, but I perfected the mission and created this video!

...And the behind the scenes BLOOPER of me actually trying to shoot the plane down! it is very hard, but very rewarding do to it, specially when you see all the bits slowly flying past you...

I will be making more vids, but for now thiese are my funniest ones! Please check out my channel if you want to support me with my videos!
